description:
Everyone goes hiking to find a mystical mushroom that makes you reveal your inner thoughts and feelings, and everyone has eyes on who they plan to get the truth out of.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ayashi no Madoka! Kinoko de Honne 120%
Mystical Madoka! The Mushrooms of 120% Truthfulness
妖しのまどか! キノコの本音120%
